location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government at Bombay to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter forwarding a copy of a letter from David Charles Ramsay, Agent at Mocha to Francis Warden, dated 23 June 1816, reporting on the situation in Arabia and rumours that Pacha Alee [Ali Pasha] is assembling boats at Jedda [Jeddah] to fight the Joasemee [Qasimi] at Ruselkhyma [Ras al Khaima].
